diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Clear-cell renal-cell carcinoma and PLA2R-type membranous nephropathy
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with a renal mass suspicious for renal-cell carcinoma and nephrotic-range proteinuria, which was inconsistent with classic diabetic nephropathy. The coexistence of clear-cell renal-cell carcinoma and membranous nephropathy was supported by biopsy results showing characteristic features of both conditions.
